subItems.name: CLUMPING DRUM
subItems.title: Efficient and Reliable Clumping Drum Solutions
subItems.description: With our EMP model, which has been developed according to the principle of minimum energy consumption, we put an end to energy losses in belt pulleys with reducer-driven photocells. EMP® Staior design comes with holes that can be measured as a 6Ge connected to the heat exchanger. The hole design allows for smaller air bubbles to form, which provides better bonding with finer ore particles in the cleaning and cleaning circuits. Optionally, in the cable flotation circuit, these holes can be closed with polyurethane caps and larger air bubbles can be formed.

subItems.name: CONDITIONERS
subItems.title: IMEC Advanced Conditioners: Optimal Performance and Efficiency Solutions
subItems.description: A conditioning tank plays a crucial role in the flotation process by ensuring thorough mixing of chemical reagents with the ore, which is essential for the proper adhesion of surfactants like collectors, frothers, and modifiers to mineral surfaces. It ensures uniform mixing of ore and reagents, leading to consistent material composition for efficient flotation. The tank also provides necessary interaction time for effective reagent adsorption on minerals and helps adjust pH and ionic strength, optimizing the chemical environment for the flotation process. These functions significantly impact overall efficiency and performance.
subItems.typesHeader: High-Performance Conditioner System for Flotation Processes

subItems.name: FLOATATION CELLS
subItems.title: IMEC Flotation Cells: Cutting-Edge Technology for Optimal Mineral Recovery
subItems.description: With our EMPR model, developed with the principle of minimum energy consumption, we eliminate energy losses caused by belt pulleys in reducer-driven flotation cells. The EMP® Stator design comes with optional perforated holes. This hole design allows for the creation of smaller air bubbles, which provides a better contact angle with finer ore particles in sweeping and cleaning circuits. Optionally, in the coarse flotation circuit, these holes can be covered with bolted polyurethane caps to create larger air bubbles.
subItems.typesHeader: Exterior View of IMEC Flotation Cell

subItems.name: FOAM PUMP
subItems.title: IMEC Foam Pump: Efficient Solutions for Foam Management
subItems.description: The IMEC Foam Pump is engineered to deliver superior performance in managing and transporting foam within industrial processes. Designed with advanced technology, this pump efficiently handles foam with minimal energy consumption and optimal reliability. Its robust construction ensures durability and longevity, even under demanding conditions. The IMEC Foam Pump is ideal for applications where precise foam control is crucial, providing consistent flow rates and reducing operational costs. With its innovative design, the IMEC Foam Pump enhances overall process efficiency, making it a valuable addition to any industrial setup requiring effective foam management.

subItems.name: TICKENER
subItems.title: IMEC Tickener: Advanced Solution for Efficient Solid Settling
subItems.description: Deep Mineral Process designs tikiners to reduce flocculant consumption and ensure the required solid settling. The key feature of our tikiner design is to cut off all the energy of the pulp in the feed box and transfer it to the feedwell by its own gravity. To achieve the desired water purity, dilution is performed in the feedwell, and the flow is directed into the tank to allow solid particles to fall freely from the static blades to the tank cone under gravitational acceleration.

subItems.name: SLURRY PUMPS
subItems.title: High-Efficiency Slurry Pumps for Robust Material Handling
subItems.description: We manufacture five types of horizontal heavy-duty pumps, namely DMP MD 10.8, DMP MD 8.6, DMP MD 6.4, DMP MD 4.3, and DMP MD 3.2. These pumps are designed to withstand harsh, abrasive environments and are available with high-chrome or rubber linings, and can be equipped with either expeller or wet systems.
subItems.typesHeader: IMEC Slurry Pump Wet System

subItems.name: SLURRY DENSITY METER
subItems.title: Slurry Density Meter: Precision Measurement for Optimal Process Control
subItems.description: The Rhosonics SDM stands for Slurry Density Meter, which is a category of instruments that allows for measuring the density of slurries in real-time. This instrument uses a non-intrusive ultrasonic sensor to measure the real-time density of mineral slurries under high-density levels and at very large pipes. Moreover, the SDMs have a robust design with sensors made of highly abrasion-resistant materials, making them ideal for rough process conditions. Rhosonics helps mineral processing plants and other industries to replace nuclear density gauges by non-hazardous ultrasonic technology. Consequently, operators can achieve process optimization in a safer, more reliable, sustainable, and cost-effective way. This is how Rhosonics contributes to a greener and smarter industry. On November 2nd,2023, Rhosonics released the latest version of the SDM, the SDM ECO. The SDM ECO is an upgrade of the SDM-4 in terms of accuracy, response time, operating temperature range, and sensor design. In addition to that, the SDM ECO can be controlled by a 7’’ touchscreen display, laptop, via optional Wi-Fi, or from anywhere with server access.
subItems.typesHeader: Slurry Density Meter Flow Measurement Point

subItems.name: CHEMICAL DENSITY METER
subItems.title: High-Accuracy Chemical Density Meter for Industrial Applications
subItems.description: Rhosonics CDM stands for Chemical-based slurry Density Meter, which is a category of instruments that allows for real-time density measurement. The CDMs have a robust design that uses sensors made of highly corrosion and abrasion-resistant materials, enabling them to withstand rough process conditions.In various industries, the Chemical Density Meters are used whenever there is a requirement for measuring chemical-based slurries or liquors. Some of the sectors where this technology is used are Mining, Ore refineries and Pulp & Paper.
subItems.typesHeader: Chemical Density Meter Sensor and Probe Close-Up

subItems.name: CHEMICAL CONCENTRATION METER
subItems.title: High-Performance Chemical Concentration Meter for Reliable Monitoring
subItems.description: Numerous industries use chemical concentrations in their production processes because accurate and reliable measurement is important for process optimization. Therefore, Rhosonics has developed several CCM models that can withstand harsh process conditions and are resistant to a wide range of chemicals.Overall, the Rhosonics Chemical Concentration Meter is a valuable tool for industries that require accurate and reliable measurement of chemical concentration. Its ease of use, accuracy, and efficiency make it an ideal choice for a variety of applications.
subItems.typesDescription: Some of the industries that can benefit from this technology include:

types.type: Copper Foil plants for measuring H2SO4 & Cu++ concentrations.
Zinc refineries for measuring H2SO4 & Zn concentrations.
Breweries’ wastewater treatment plants (WWTPs) for measuring chemical concentrations in the wastewater. In addition, the CCMs are capable of measuring the COD concentration of sugar-based wastewater.
Flat Panel Display manufacturing plants for measuring complex chemical mixtures such as TMAH+PR+(CO3).

subItems.name: Gate Valve DIN F4
subItems.title: Gate Valve with Rubber-Coated Wedge per DIN F4
subItems.description: The SG45R-16D series gate valve is engineered for high performance and durability, featuring a rubber-coated wedge that enhances sealing and reduces friction. With a wide range of nominal diameters (DN 50-1000) and a pressure rating of PN 16, this valve is suitable for various industrial applications. The temperature range of -25°C to +130°C ensures versatility in different operational conditions. Constructed from ductile iron (GJS), both the valve body and the wedge offer robust resistance to wear and corrosion. The wedge is coated with EPDM for improved sealing and longevity. This valve conforms to Class A standards as per GOST 54808-2011, ensuring reliable operation and quality assurance. Designed to meet DIN F4 specifications, this gate valve provides dependable performance and ease of maintenance, making it an excellent choice for managing flow in demanding environments.
subItems.typesDescription: Gate Valve with Rubber-Coated Wedge per DIN F4

types.type: Wedge Material: Ductile Iron (GJS) coated with EPDM

subItems.name: Rubber-Coated Gate Valve
subItems.title: Gate Valve with Rubber-Coated Wedge and Double Stem Gland
subItems.description: The SG45R-16DP series gate valve is designed for high-performance and durability in demanding environments. This valve features a double stem gland for enhanced sealing and protection against leakage, making it suitable for applications requiring a high level of reliability. The valve is equipped with a rubber-coated wedge, which provides superior sealing and reduces friction, ensuring smooth operation.
subItems.typesDescription: Gate Valve with Rubber-Coated Wedge and Double Stem Gland

types.type: Wedge Material: Ductile Iron (GJS) coated with EPDM

subItems.name: Rubber-Coated Gate Valve (Underground)
subItems.title: Gate Valve with Rubber-Coated Wedge (Underground)
subItems.description: The SG45R-16DU series gate valve is engineered for underground applications, delivering robust and reliable performance under challenging conditions. Featuring a rubber-coated wedge for excellent sealing and reduced friction, this valve operates smoothly and efficiently. It is suitable for a broad range of flow requirements, available in nominal diameters from DN 50 to DN 1000 with a pressure rating of PN 16. The valve is versatile across a temperature range of -25°C to +130°C, with its ductile iron (GJS) body and wedge providing strong resistance to corrosion. The EPDM-coated wedge enhances sealing capabilities and extends the valve's lifespan. Compliant with Class A standards as per GOST 54808-2011, the SG45R-16DU ensures high-quality, reliable operation, making it an ideal choice for secure fluid control in critical infrastructure and industrial applications.
subItems.typesDescription: Gate Valve with Rubber-Coated Wedge (Underground)

types.type: Wedge Material: Ductile Iron (GJS) coated with EPDM

subItems.name: Rubber-Coated Gate Valve (Light)
subItems.title: Gate Valve with Rubber-Coated Wedge (Light)
subItems.description: The SG45R-16DL series gate valve is crafted for applications that benefit from a lighter construction, providing reliable performance with ease of installation and handling. Featuring a rubber-coated wedge for excellent sealing and smooth operation, it handles nominal diameters from DN 50 to DN 600 with a pressure rating of PN 16. Operating effectively in temperatures from -10°C to +120°C, the valve's body and wedge are made from ductile iron (GJS), offering robust strength and corrosion resistance. The EPDM coating on the wedge enhances sealing and extends the valve's lifespan. Compliant with Class A standards according to GOST 54808-2011, the SG45R-16DL valve delivers dependable operation, making it ideal for less demanding industrial and infrastructure applications where a lighter option is preferred, with a design that emphasizes performance and ease of maintenance.
subItems.typesDescription: Gate Valve with Rubber-Coated Wedge (Light)

types.type: Wedge Material: Ductile Iron (GJS) coated with EPDM

subItems.name: Butterfly Valve
subItems.title: Wafer-Type Butterfly Valve
subItems.description: The SB71R-16D series wafer-type butterfly valve is designed for versatile applications, offering reliable flow control across various industries. It features a durable disc made from ductile iron (GJS), available with nickel plating or in stainless steel, ensuring excellent corrosion resistance and longevity. The valve body, also constructed from ductile iron (GJS), provides robust performance under diverse conditions. With nominal diameters ranging from DN 40 to DN 1200 and a pressure rating of PN 10-16, the valve efficiently operates within a temperature range of -25°C to +120°C. It offers multiple sealing options, including EPDM, NBR, VITON, and PTFE, to suit different media and application needs. Compliant with Class A standards according to GOST 54808-2011, the SB71R-16D valve guarantees high-quality, reliable operation. It is designed for easy integration with various actuators, adhering to the ISO 5211 standard, and is suitable for both manual and automated systems, making it an ideal choice for industries requiring precise and dependable flow control solutions.
subItems.typesDescription: Wafer-Type Butterfly Valve

types.type: Disc Material: Ductile Iron (GJS) with Nickel Plating, Stainless Steel
Seal Options: EPDM, NBR, VITON, PTFE

subItems.name: Butterfly Valve Eco
subItems.title: Wafer-Type Butterfly Valve Eco
subItems.description: The SB71R-16E series Eco wafer-type butterfly valve offers a cost-effective and efficient solution for flow control across diverse industries. With a cast iron body and a disc available in cast iron with a protective coating or stainless steel, it delivers reliable performance and durability. Supporting nominal diameters from DN 40 to DN 1200 and a pressure rating of PN 10-16, this valve is versatile for various applications. It operates within a temperature range of -10°C to +100°C and provides multiple sealing options, including EPDM, NBR, and VITON, to suit different media and requirements. Compliant with Class A standards per GOST 54808-2011, it ensures high-quality, dependable operation. Designed for easy integration with actuators according to ISO 5211, the SB71R-16E is ideal for both manual and automated systems, offering a practical and economical choice for reliable flow control solutions.
subItems.typesDescription: Wafer-Type Butterfly Valve Eco

types.type: Disc Material: Cast Iron with Coating, Stainless Steel

subItems.name: Butterfly Valve LT
subItems.title: Wafer-Type Butterfly Valve LT
subItems.description: The SB71R-16L series wafer-type butterfly valve LT is engineered for reliable and efficient flow control in various industrial settings. It features a sturdy construction with a body made from either ductile iron (GJS) or stainless steel, and a disc made from ductile iron with nickel plating or stainless steel, providing excellent durability and resistance to corrosion. This valve supports nominal diameters from DN 40 to DN 1200 and operates within a pressure range of PN 10-16. It performs effectively across a temperature range of -25°C to +120°C and offers multiple sealing options, including EPDM, NBR, VITON, and PTFE, to meet diverse media and application needs. Compliant with Class A standards per GOST 54808-2011, the SB71R-16L ensures high-quality, dependable performance. Designed for easy integration with actuators as per ISO 5211, it is suitable for both manual and automated operations, making it an ideal choice for demanding flow control applications.
subItems.typesDescription: Wafer-Type Butterfly Valve LT

types.type: Body Material: Ductile Iron (GJS) / Stainless Steel
Disc Material: Ductile Iron (GJS) with Nickel Plating, Stainless Steel
Seal Options: EPDM, NBR, VITON, PTFE

subItems.name: Symmetric Butterfly Valve
subItems.title: Symmetric Flanged Cast Iron Butterfly Valve
subItems.description: The SB41R-16D series symmetric flanged butterfly valve is designed for robust and reliable flow control in various industrial applications. Featuring a durable body made from ductile iron (GJS) and a disc available in ductile iron with nickel plating or stainless steel, this valve ensures high performance and excellent corrosion resistance. It supports nominal diameters from DN 50 to DN 1200 and operates within a pressure range of PN 10-16, making it suitable for a broad range of applications. Capable of functioning within a temperature range of -25°C to +120°C, the SB41R-16D offers versatile sealing options, including EPDM, NBR, and VITON, to meet different media and operational requirements. Compliant with Class A standards according to GOST 54808-2011, this valve guarantees reliable, high-quality performance. Designed for compatibility with actuators as per ISO 5211, it is suitable for both manual and automated systems, providing a dependable solution for demanding flow control tasks.
subItems.typesDescription: Symmetric Flanged Cast Iron Butterfly Valve

types.type: Disc Material: Ductile Iron (GJS) with Nickel Plating, Stainless Steel

subItems.name: Wafer-Type Slide Gate Valve
subItems.title: Wafer-Type Slide Gate Valve
subItems.description: The SG73R-10D series wafer-type slide gate valve is designed for reliable and efficient flow control in a variety of industrial applications. It features a robust body made from ductile iron (GJS) and a durable blade crafted from stainless steel 08X18H10, offering excellent corrosion resistance and strength. This valve supports nominal diameters ranging from DN 50 to DN 1200 and operates within a pressure range of PN 10-16. It is effective across a temperature range of -25°C to +130°C and provides sealing options with EPDM or NBR to accommodate different media and operational needs. The bidirectional flow capability enhances its versatility, making it suitable for applications requiring dependable control in both directions. Compliant with Class A standards according to GOST 54808-2011, the SG73R-10D ensures high-quality, dependable performance.
subItems.typesDescription: Wafer-Type Slide Gate Valve

subItems.name: Particle Size Analyzer
subItems.title: PSA – Particle Size Analyzer
subItems.description: The PSA provides real-time process monitoring in wet streams. Analyzing dozens of pictures per minute it literally looks into the process slurry. Its advanced software provides the Particle Size, images and more; with results displayed directly in the site’s control system.

subItems.name: Double-Eccentric Butterfly Valve
subItems.title: Double-Eccentric Butterfly Valve
subItems.description: The SB42R-16D series double-eccentric butterfly valve is engineered for high-efficiency flow control in various industrial environments. It features a durable body and disc, both made from ductile iron (GJS), providing excellent strength and resistance to wear. This valve supports nominal diameters from DN 80 to DN 1400 and operates within a pressure range of PN 10-16. It functions effectively across a temperature range of -25°C to +120°C and offers sealing options with EPDM or NBR to suit different media requirements. The SB42R-16D is designed for bidirectional flow, enhancing its versatility in applications requiring reliable flow control from either direction. Compliant with Class A standards according to GOST 54808-2011, this valve ensures high-quality, dependable performance, making it a robust choice for various flow control applications.
subItems.typesDescription: Double-Eccentric Butterfly Valve

subItems.name: Jaw Crushers
subItems.title: Versatile Jaw Crushers for Primary and Secondary Crushing
subItems.description: Jaw crushers are engineered to crush stones of all hardness levels, making them versatile machines suitable for a variety of applications. They can serve as both primary crushers, handling large rocks at the initial stage of crushing, and as secondary crushers, further reducing the size of materials after primary crushing. The crushing process in jaw crushers involves applying high pressure, which efficiently breaks down the material due to the machine's working principle.
subItems.typesHeader: Primary Jaw Crushers:

categories.categoryDescription: These jaw crushers are designed for primary crushing applications, capable of handling large rocks and providing initial size reduction. They are built to withstand high pressures and heavy loads.

Secondary jaw crushers are used for secondary crushing stages, further reducing the size of materials after primary crushing. They are designed to handle smaller feed sizes and finer output specifications.

subItems.name: Vibration Analyzer
subItems.title: Advanced Vibration Analyzer for Predictive Maintenance and Diagnostics
subItems.description: A vibration analyzer is a specialized device used to measure and analyze vibrations in machinery and equipment. It helps in detecting imbalances, misalignments, and other issues in mechanical systems by capturing vibration signals and processing them to determine the frequency and amplitude of the vibrations. The data collected by a vibration analyzer can be used for predictive maintenance, allowing maintenance teams to identify potential problems before they lead to equipment failure. This tool is essential in various industries, including manufacturing, power generation, and automotive, where it aids in ensuring machinery operates efficiently and with minimal downtime.
subItems.typesHeader: Vibration Analyzers:

subCats.name: NEST i4.0
subCats.title: NEST i4.0
subCats.description: NEST is a predictive maintenance software that helps you plan maintenance actions by monitoring the condition of rotating equipment. A user-friendly interface has been designed, from creating a database to the reporting step. Key features include automatic machine tree setup, guided analysis, and easy access to autonomous reports. Data collected from wireless sensors and processed through AI systems like Accurex™ make it easier and faster to generate predictive maintenance reports. Thanks to its flexible software architecture, it allows viewing multiple factories on a single cloud interface.
subCats.head_3: Complete Support for Your Analysis Process
subCats.paragraph_1: The NEST i4.0 software provides clear and autonomous dashboards and reports for all employees involved in the maintenance and management processes of rotating equipment. Easily understandable visuals that summarize the entire situation offer information about asset condition to both staff with no vibration analysis knowledge and the most skilled vibration analysts. Reports can be accessed instantly from anywhere in the world through a regular internet connection.
subCats.paragraph_2: One of the most laborious and tedious tasks in the predictive maintenance process is creating machine trees for rotating equipment. However, with the autonomous machine tree creation feature offered by NEST i4.0, this process becomes much faster and error-free. All you need to do is use the 'drag and drop' tool to create machine directories and define kinematic information (such as motor power, RPM, etc.). Then, NEST i4.0 will automatically generate measurement tasks based on this information. With this configuration, you can use the Accurex™ automatic analysis tool without errors. Even if you have no vibration data, all the necessary measurement routes for your critical equipment will be ready for use in minutes.
subCats.paragraph_3: NEST i4.0 is the most efficient vibration analysis software available on the market. In addition to all traditional analysis tools, users are guided to precise points in their analyses through innovative tools such as the Health Matrix screen, Bearing Defect Factor™, Shock Finder™ for low-speed equipment, HarmoniX™ index, and the Accurex™ AI engine. The Analyst module also features advanced analysis tools such as combined spectrum screens, circular time signals, patent-pending bode ellipses, waterfall charts, and orbit charts. This allows everyone from the least experienced users to the most skilled vibration analysts to access necessary machine health information from a single software.
subCats.paragraph_4: In today's world, making data-driven decisions is crucial for increasing the reliability and profitability of facilities. The NEST i4.0 software, with its ability to integrate with cloud systems, allows you to monitor data from factories located in different parts of the world and our country from a centralized software. Additionally, with the NEST Dashboard interface, all assets can be remotely monitored through a single interface using data from one or more remote locations and various data sources such as Falcon, Eagle, or MVX. Fully compliant with new IT requirements for cybersecurity, NEST Dashboard is ideal for central monitoring architecture and can be easily accessed from phones, tablets, and computers with any internet connection.

partner.title: Rhosonics
partner.content: Rhosonics specializes in the development and manufacturing of ultrasonic analyzers for measuring the density and concentration of liquids and slurries. Their innovative solutions serve various industries, including mineral processing, dredging, water and wastewater, pulp and paper, and the semiconductor industry. By offering non-invasive, real-time measurement technologies, Rhosonics helps businesses improve process efficiency, reduce operational costs, and minimize environmental impact. Their products are known for reliability and accuracy, providing valuable data for optimizing industrial processes.

partner.title: Ri-Se
partner.header: RISE - Industrial Maintenance and Reliability Experts
partner.content: RISE (Reliability Innovation Services & Engineering) is a leading provider of advanced solutions for industrial maintenance and reliability. Specializing in cutting-edge technologies such as vibration analysis, motion amplification, ultrasonic testing, and thermography, RISE helps clients enhance operational efficiency and safety. Their expert team offers precise diagnostics, detailed reports, and comprehensive training programs to support predictive maintenance across various industries.

partner.title: Marquimm
partner.header: Marquimm Description for IMEC Partner Page
partner.content: Marquimm, founded in 2012 and integrated into Grupo Interfusao in 2018, is a leading partner in the mining industry in South America. Specializing in metallurgical and mineral processing, Marquimm offers high-quality reagents for flotation and gold-leaching processes, such as collectors, frothers, and leaching reagents. The company also provides advanced on-stream analyzers for particle and bubble size monitoring, enhancing the efficiency and sustainability of mining operations. With a strong focus on innovation and customer support, Marquimm is dedicated to driving growth and reliability in the mining sector.

service.name: RDI MOTION AMPLIFICATION
service.title: IMEC RDI Motion Amplification Service
service.header: Enhancing Industrial Maintenance with Precision Motion Analysis
service.description: At IMEC, we are committed to providing cutting-edge solutions for industrial maintenance and reliability. Our RDI Motion Amplification Service is a revolutionary technology that amplifies tiny movements to help you identify and diagnose machinery issues with unprecedented clarity and accuracy.

content.what_is_it: Motion Amplification is a video-based technology that detects and visualizes subtle movements that are not visible to the naked eye. By amplifying these movements, our system converts them into easy-to-understand visual data, allowing for precise identification of issues in machinery and structures.
features: High-Definition Video Analysis: Captures high-resolution video of your machinery in action, ensuring every detail is recorded.
Non-Invasive Technique: Requires no physical contact with your equipment, minimizing downtime and disruption.
Comprehensive Diagnostics: Identifies issues such as misalignment, imbalance, looseness, and structural defects.
Real-Time Reporting: Provides immediate feedback and detailed reports, facilitating quick decision-making.
benefits: Increased Reliability: Early detection of potential issues prevents unexpected failures and extends machinery life.
Cost Savings: Reduces the need for frequent manual inspections and costly unplanned downtime.
Enhanced Safety: Identifies and mitigates risks before they become critical, ensuring a safer working environment.
Optimized Performance: Ensures machinery operates at peak efficiency, improving overall productivity.
applications: Rotating Equipment: Pumps, motors, fans, and compressors.
Structural Components: Beams, foundations, and piping.
Mechanical Systems: Conveyors, gearboxes, and couplings.
content.why_choose_imec: IMEC combines advanced technology with expert knowledge to deliver unparalleled motion amplification services. Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to helping you achieve optimal machinery performance and reliability.
